flawed_nl_solution:
She works 8 hours a day at $16 an hour so she makes 8*16 = $<<8*16=128>>128 a day
She works this job 5 days a week so she makes 128*5 = $<<128*5=640>>640 in 5 days
She works 2 hours a day at $13.5 an hour so she makes 2*13.5 = $<<2*13.5=72>>72 a day
She works this job 5 days a week so she makes 72*5 = $<<72*5=360>>360
She makes $640 at her main job and $360 at her part-time job so all total she makes 640+360 = $<<640+360=1000>>1000 in 5 days
#### 1000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 72. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
